column3: 2015) send sympathy card betty a (stalgaitis) edmonds
column10: at home in the care of her family. she is survived by her husband of 60 years
column11: charles t. edmonds. betty owned and operated betty's ceramic shop where she fired ceramics
column12: sold retail and taught ceramic classes. she was a tamaqua area high school graduate. born in tamaqua
column13: she was the daughter of the late joseph stalgaitis and the late anna (bozis) stalgaitis. she is also survived by her one daughter
column14: kim leary of tamaqua; two sons
column15: charles ""chuck"" w. edmonds and his wife brenda of tamaqua; bruce j edmonds and his wife margaret of tamaqua; one sister
column16: dorothy souders of georgia; three grandchildren seven great-grandchildren five great-great-grandchildren. preceded in death by her brother
column20: and mary geiger. private arrangements have been entrusted to the e. franklin griffiths funeral home and cremation services
column23: pa. interment will be at sky view memorial park
